Amotus Solutions Inc. | Embedded Software Engineer | Quebec City, Quebec, Canada | FULLTIME | ONSITE

http://www.amotus.ca/career/

Amotus Solutions is a high quality design house specialized in embedded industrial devices. We do everything from the hardware to the software.

We are currently looking for an experienced embedded software engineer to work on embedded Linux projects (Yocto, device drivers for custom hardware, micro-controller firmware, C/C++/Python applications, etc).

To learn more or to apply: hr@amotus.ca
